statements.statement: SELECT DIC_ID , DIC_TXT_KR , DIC_TXT_EN , DIC_TXT_LO , CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), REGIST_DATE, 121) AS REGIST_DATE , REGIST_USER_ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), MODIFY_DATE, 121) AS MODIFY_DATE , MODIFY_USER_ID , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC) AS ROW_NUM FROM MES_DICTIONARY_MA WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE DIC_ID LIKE '%' + (CASE WHEN #DIC_ID# = '' THEN DIC_ID ELSE #DIC_ID# END) + '%' AND ( DIC_TXT_KR LIKE '%' + (CASE WHEN #DIC_NM# = '' THEN DIC_TXT_KR ELSE #DIC_NM# END) + '%' OR DIC_TXT_EN LIKE '%' + (CASE WHEN #DIC_NM# = '' THEN DIC_TXT_EN ELSE #DIC_NM# END) + '%' OR DIC_TXT_LO LIKE '%' + (CASE WHEN #DIC_NM# = '' THEN DIC_TXT_LO ELSE #DIC_NM# END) + '%' ) ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC
SELECT DIC_ID , DIC_TXT_KR , DIC_TXT_EN , DIC_TXT_LO FROM MES_DICTIONARY_MA WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE DIC_ID = #DIC_ID#
SELECT COUNT(DIC_ID) AS VAL_CHK FROM MES_DICTIONARY_MA WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE DIC_ID = #DIC_ID#

MERGE INTO MES_DICTIONARY_MA AS A USING (SELECT #DIC_ID#) AS B (DIC_ID) ON (A.DIC_ID = B.DIC_ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.DIC_TXT_KR = #DIC_TXT_KR# , A.DIC_TXT_EN = #DIC_TXT_EN# , A.DIC_TXT_LO = #DIC_TXT_LO# , A.MODIFY_DATE = GETDATE() , A.MODIFY_USER_ID = #REG_ID# WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT( DIC_ID, DIC_TXT_KR, DIC_TXT_EN, DIC_TXT_LO, REGIST_DATE, REGIST_USER_ID, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #DIC_ID#, #DIC_TXT_KR#, #DIC_TXT_EN#, #DIC_TXT_LO#, GETDATE(), #REG_ID#, GETDATE(), #REG_ID# );
